seo.title: Harsh Hajela - Senior Full Stack Engineer | Java, Angular, AWS
seo.description: Experienced full-stack engineer specializing in Java, Spring Boot, Angular, microservices, and AWS cloud solutions. Available for senior development roles in London.
seo.author: Harsh Hajela

experience.description: Led full-stack engineering for data-intensive platforms, driving cloud-native delivery and database modernization initiatives.
achievements: Architected a real-time market data pipeline handling 50K+ price updates/sec with sub-100ms latency.
Delivered resilient Kotlin/Spring Boot microservices with rolling updates and auto-scaling, ensuring zero downtime deployments.
Optimised RabbitMQ streams to achieve p99 delivery under 5ms across 300K+ messages/min through queue sharding and tuning.
Spearheaded enterprise-wide migration from MySQL to PostgreSQL, reducing complex query times by 40%.
Established observability stack with Prometheus and Grafana, reducing mean-time-to-detect incidents by 35%.
Mentored junior engineers through pair programming and rigorous code reviews, improving onboarding speed and code quality.

experience.description: Specialized in payments engineering within the online gambling sector, driving compliance, scalability, and seamless player transactions.
achievements: Upgraded payments microservices to Java 17 and Spring Boot 3, improving performance, security posture, and compliance readiness.
Redesigned the payment-service database to isolate critical components, enhancing maintainability and data governance.
Extracted wallet and responsible gaming features into standalone microservices, strengthening scalability and regulatory compliance.
Implemented instant auto-withdrawals, reducing withdrawal time from 4 days to seconds and automating fraud-prevention checks.
Collaborated with compliance and product teams to align system capabilities with PCI DSS standards and responsible gaming regulations.

experience.description: Delivered scalable IoT and smart-city platforms enabling large-scale street lighting and sensor network management.
achievements: Led development of Java/Spring Boot satellite services powering smart-city features such as device onboarding, scheduling, and fault reporting.
Built a TALQ-compliant Central Management System, ensuring interoperability across heterogeneous controllers and gateways.
Designed resilient REST APIs with clear versioning, idempotency, and contract tests to guarantee backward compatibility.
Implemented RabbitMQ-driven event workflows processing high-volume telemetry and acknowledgements with robust back-pressure controls.
Optimized PostgreSQL and Firebird databases with indexing, pooling, and caching, improving throughput and responsiveness.
Migrated microservices to Java 11 and hardened deployments with Docker and Ansible for secure, repeatable releases.

experience.description: Directed architecture and delivery of a full-stack iGaming platform, powering millions of player sessions daily with industry-leading availability and compliance.
achievements: Architected a modular casino platform handling 1M+ daily sessions with 99.98% uptime, covering wallet, bonus engine, CMS, tournaments, and fraud detection.
Led migration from monolith to Spring Boot microservices, cutting feature delivery time by 40% and enabling elastic horizontal scaling.
Integrated 30+ third-party systems (payment gateways, slot providers, sportsbooks, messaging services) with resilient REST and MQ contracts.
Embedded robust KYC, AML, and audit logging to achieve Tier-1 regulator certifications (MGA, UKGC, Curacao), enabling entry into 3 new markets.
Championed DevOps adoption with containerized workloads, automated CI/CD, and proactive monitoring, reducing deployment rollback incidents by 60%.
Represented the company at global iGaming conferences, building strategic partnerships and showcasing platform capabilities to B2B clients.

experience.description: Built large-scale web scraping and data validation frameworks for Google’s hotel price platform.
achievements: Developed a Python/Selenium-based framework to crawl 500+ dynamic, JS-heavy travel sites, scraping over 1M URLs daily.
Automated price validation pipelines that compared partner data with Google search results, improving accuracy of displayed pricing.
Optimized scraping reliability with advanced DOM interaction strategies for AJAX-heavy content.
Delivered daily automated discrepancy reports, giving management real-time insights into data accuracy and partner compliance.

experience.description: Delivered automation and configuration management tools for Boeing’s aerospace programs, improving efficiency across aircraft interior design processes.
achievements: Owned development of a Python-based automation suite covering 14 applications across domains such as floors and PSU, streamlining airplane interior configuration.
Captured and validated customer preferences, automating complex workflows in CATIA and Enovia to reduce manual effort and design errors.
Collaborated closely with Boeing stakeholders through all SDLC phases — requirements, design, implementation, and delivery.
Improved engineering productivity by automating repetitive design tasks, freeing teams to focus on higher-value engineering work.

Detailed agent pages explaining business use cases
Live integration with APIs to simulate real workflows
Automatic history tracking of queries and results

Demonstrates productivity boosts through automation and research
Provides a reusable foundation to quickly add and test new agents
Strengthens portfolio by showing tangible, hands-on AI applications

projects.title: Personal Blog - Angular + Contentful
projects.description: Modern blog with Contentful CMS, S3 static hosting, SEO, and smooth animations
projects.longDescription: Angular 16 SPA that fetches content from Contentful CMS and renders responsive, animated pages (hero + latest articles + contact). Deployed as a static website on AWS S3 with SPA routing fallback. Designed for fast performance, accessibility, and shareable previews.
features: Gradient hero with clear CTA
Latest Articles feed with responsive cards
Contact page with info, links, and feature highlights
Dark / light theme toggle
SEO metadata, OpenGraph cards, sitemap & RSS
Content managed via Contentful (no redeploy for new posts)
SPA routing with index.html fallback on S3
Reduced-motion friendly animations
challenges: SEO & social previews without server-side rendering
Modeling Contentful types for posts and metadata
Image optimization and lazy loading for article cards
S3 static website routing and cache control
outcomes: Authoring workflow decoupled from code via CMS
Consistent UX across breakpoints and themes
